name: Squeegee.js
tagline: Panning and deep zoom for SVG
body:
### Introducing Squeegee.js
Squeegee.js is a simple javascript library that can be embedded directly into your SVG documents to provide panning and deep zoom functionality.  Squeegee does for SVG what [Zoom.it](http://zoom.it/) does for static images.

Usage: Simply include the squeegee javascript in your SVG file, and give the desired object an id named 'viewport'

```
...
<script xlink:href="svgpan-min.js"/>
<g id="viewport" ...
```

### Example
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
